dataviz_critique.title: Data Visualization Challenge
dataviz_critique.question_text: Examine their plot and find at least three bad data viz practices. Then say which one you think is the worst and why.

chapter5_q8.title: Chapter 5, Question 8: Summarizing Center
chapter5_q8.question_text: Examine this plot showing gene expression levels in different tissues. Identify at least three weaknesses in its design. Then say which one you think is the most serious and why.

p_value_interpretation.title: Interpreting P-Values
p_value_interpretation.question_text: A study comparing a new drug to a placebo finds a p-value of 0.03 for the reduction in blood pressure. In one sentence, how would you correctly interpret this p-value?

study_bias.title: Identifying Bias in a Study
study_bias.question_text: A pharmaceutical company wants to test its new headache drug. They recruit volunteers through a newspaper ad and give the new drug to everyone. 90% of the volunteers report that their headache improved. The company claims the drug is highly effective. What is a major flaw in this study design?
